The Role: ForgeRock is seeking a seasoned, full-time Executive Assistant to support its C-Level Management at our headquarters in San Francisco. The Executive Assistant will be reporting to the Executive Assistant Manager. This Rock Star will demonstrate the ability to juggle many competing priorities and maintain poise under pressure with a great sense of humor and professionalism in a fast-paced dynamic entrepreneurial culture. The EA will be interfacing with everyone from our global colleagues to vendors to high-profile clients so will need to have excellent interpersonal skills, a proactive approach to problem-solving, and the ability to work independently alongside staff and management of all levels. Must be comfortable to navigate with online ordering, Google Docs, online research, and simple troubleshooting of audio-visual systems. We operate on Macs and use Apple TVs.Attributes:Extremely motivated and performance-driven individual.
